_README.description: Christoph's curated OpenRouter model stack - optimized for coding workflows
_README.usage: Models listed here are exposed through OpenRouter. Aliases are case-insensitive.
_README.note: Aliases use -cloud suffix to avoid conflicts with local Ollama models

field_descriptions.aliases: Array of short names users can type instead of the full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens the model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether the model supports extended reasoning tokens
field_descriptions.supports_json_mode: Whether the model can guarantee valid JSON output
field_descriptions.supports_function_calling: Whether the model supports function/tool calling
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether the model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.max_image_size_mb: Maximum total size in MB for all images combined (capped at 40MB max)
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether the model accepts temperature parameter (set false for O3/O4)
field_descriptions.temperature_constraint: Type: 'fixed', 'range', 'discrete', or omit for default range
field_descriptions.use_openai_response_api: Set true for /responses endpoint (reasoning models like GPT-5.2 Pro)
field_descriptions.default_reasoning_effort: Default reasoning effort: 'low', 'medium', 'high'. Omit if N/A
field_descriptions.allow_code_generation: Set true only for models more capable than your current AI CLI

models.description: DeepSeek V3.2 - GPT-5 class workhorse for bulk grinding, C++ to Rust, tests, scaffolding
DeepSeek V3.2 Speciale - Maximum reasoning for complex architecture and algorithm design
Qwen3 Coder 480B - Pure code focus, 262K context for entire repo reasoning
Grok Code Fast 1 - Speed king for fast iterations, optimized for Rust/C++/Python/TS
MiMo-V2-Flash - Cheapest paid, #1 SWE-bench, great for agentic coding (disable reasoning)
MiMo-V2-Flash Free - Zero cost for test runs and low-stakes tasks
Gemini 2.5 Flash - Fast for quick questions during flow, 1M context with vision
Mistral Large 3 - 675B MoE, 41B active, Apache 2.0, strong all-rounder fallback
Llama 4 Maverick - 400B MoE, 1M context, multimodal powerhouse for images
Llama 3.3 70B Free - Solid 70B dense model, multilingual, quality without cost
